purposeStrings.NSCameraUsageDescription: Fedi akeneye kwinjira kuri kamera kugirango asuzume kode ya QR
purposeStrings.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Fedi akeneye kwinjira kuri mikoro yawe kugirango yandike amashusho yimibereho
purposeStrings.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Fedi akeneye uburyo bwo kubika amafoto mubitabo byamafoto
purposeStrings.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Fedi akeneye kubona isomero ryamafoto yawe kugirango uhitemo itangazamakuru rya avatar yawe hamwe nu mugereka

errors.bad-connection: Umuyoboro wawe ushobora kuba udatunganye. nyabuneka ongera ugerageza nyuma ho gato cyangwa iyunge ku wundi muyoboro
errors.browser-feature-not-supported: Mushakisha yawe ntabwo ifite ingufu zo kwerekana icyo ushaka
errors.chat-connection-unhealthy: Umuyoboro w'ibiganiro ntabwo uterereye cyangwa nturi ku murongo. Nyabuneka gerageza kongera nyuma cyangwa wongere gufungura indi porogaramu
errors.chat-list-render-error: Hari ikosa rigaragara mu biganiro byawe
errors.chat-member-not-found: Ushobora kutabona uyu ukoresha uyu murongo
errors.chat-message-render-error: Hari ikosa rigaragara muri ubu butumwa
errors.chat-payment-failed: Ntibyashobokaga kugarura ku gihe ubwo bwishyu
errors.get-nostr-pubkey-failed: Yananiwe kugera ku nostr pub rufunguzo
errors.history-render-error: Gihuye n'ikosa riri muri iki kintu
errors.insufficient-balance: Umubare usigaye ntuhagije. Usigaje gusa {{balance}} mu mufuka wawe
errors.insufficient-balance-send: Amafaranga adahagije kugirango yemeze amafaranga. Urashobora kohereza ntarengwa {{sats}} sats
errors.invalid-federation-code: Umubare w'ibanga ry'iri shyirahamwe si wo
errors.invalid-username: Yagombye kuba imibare cyangwa inyuguti 21 cyangwa nkeya ho kandi ntiyagombye kuba mo inyuguti z'icyapa
errors.no-address-lnurlp: Iyi aderesi ntabwo ishigikira kwishyura inkuba
errors.please-force-quit-the-app: Hari ikosa rigaragaye, nyabuneka ihutire gufunga iyo porogaramu ubundi wongere kugerageza
errors.please-grant-permission: Nyamuneka tanga uruhushya rwo gukuramo iyi dosiye
errors.please-join-a-federation: Nyamuneka winjire mumuryango mbere yo kwishyura ubwishyu
errors.please-join-wallet-community: Nyamuneka winjire mumuryango wimari mbere yo kwishyura
errors.please-select-balance-federation: Nyamuneka hitamo umuganda ufite amafaranga asigaye yo kwishyura.
errors.receive-ecash-failed: Yananiwe kwakira amafaranga mu buryo bwa eCash
errors.receive-ecash-failed-claimed: Kunanirwa kwakira eCash. Iyi eCash yamaze gusabwa
errors.receives-have-been-disabled: Ukwakira amafaranga muri iri shyirahamwe byicanze
errors.recovery-failed-connection: Kugarura konti byananiranye kubera ikibazo hamwe na connexion yawe
errors.unknown-ecash-issuer: Iki kimenyetso cya eCash cyatanzwe numuryango utari umunyamuryango

backup.beta-backup: Ikiranga Beta - kora backup ya konte yawe
backup.camera-access-information: Mu gushyiraho uburyo rusange bwo kubika, uzakenera kwemerera Fedi ikoreshe kamera yawe mu gufata amashusho agenzuwe
backup.choose-method-instructions: Mu kubika mu mufuka wawe bizagufasha kuba wagaruza amafaranga yawe niba utabashije kongera kugera kuri Fedi
backup.cloud-backup-instructions: Tangiza uburyo bwo kubika mu kirere dosiye ubashije kugaruza. Kandi uzasabwa na none kubitsa iyi dosiye mu nshuti zawe ebyiri cyangwa mu muryango wawe
backup.hold-record-button: Ba ufatiye ho buto yo gufata hanyuma uvuge:
backup.personal-backup-instructions: Andika hasi amagambo 12 ubashije kugaruza. Ibi ni iby'abanyamuryango babizobereyemo
backup.press-record-button: Kanda buto yo gufata hanyuma uvuge:
backup.recovery-words-instructions: Andika hasi ku rupapuro aya magambo ukoresheje ikaramu. Ntubike aya magambo mu buryo bw'ikoranabuhamnga mu cyuma/mashini cyawe.
backup.review-face-confirmation: Ndemeza ko ishusho yanjye yagaragara byeruye muri aya mashusho/iyi videwo
backup.review-voice-confirmation: Ndemeza ko ijwi ryanje ryakumvwa byeruye muri iyi videwo/ muri aya mashusho
backup.save-your-wallet-backup-file-again: Ongera uyibike na none ahandi hantu
backup.save-your-wallet-backup-file-where: Turakugira inama yo kubika dosiye yawe ahantu hatandukanye (messaging apps; email; cloud storage etc..)
backup.social-backup-instructions: Fata videwo mu guhamya ko ari wowe. Iyi nzira ni nziza iyo uzi neza ababicunga
backup.start-personal-backup-instructions: Fata ikaramu n'urupapuro wandike hasi amagambo wagaruje yose ku yindi sikurini
backup.start-social-backup-instructions: Ukubika rusange kugufasha kubitsa mu mutekano umufuka wawe mu nshuti zawe n'umuryango kandi abacunzi bo mu ishyirahamwe bagufasha kugaruza ibyawe iyo utabashije kongera kuyifungura
backup.successfully-backed-up: Wabashije byuzuye kubika mu mufuka wawe wa Fedi
backup.video-file-too-large: Amashusho y'iyi videwo ni manini, nyabuneka fata iri ntoya

bug.success-title: Wakoze ku bwa ripoti y'amakosa wakoze

chat.broadcast-no-message: Abayobozi ntibaratangaza ubutumwa kugeza ubu. Komeza utegereje.
chat.broadcast-only-notice: Psst, abayobozi ni bo bonyine bemerewe kohereza ubutumwa hano. ü§´

chat.confirm-delete-message: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba ubu butumwa?
chat.confirm-end-poll: Uzi neza ko ushaka kurangiza aya matora?
chat.go-to-direct-chat: Genda/injira ku kiganiro kiri ho ubu
chat.invalid-group: Iri si itsinda ry'ukuri ryo kuganirira ho
chat.invalid-member: Uyu si umunyamuryango w'ukuri wo kuganira na we
chat.leave-chat-confirmation: Uzi neza ko ushaka kuva muri iki kiganiro? Amateka yubutumwa bwose azabura.
chat.leave-group-confirmation: Uremeza neza/uzi neza ko ushaka kuva muri iri tsinda? Amateka y'ubutumwa bwo muri iri tsinda buzabura
chat.need-registration-description: Tegura gushyira ahagaragara izina ryawe kugira ngo babashe gushiya ho uburyo bwo kohereza cyangwa kwakira hamwe n'abandi
chat.no-messages: kugeza ubu nta biganiro biri ho muri iki cyumba
chat.public-group-notice: Iri ni itsinda rusange. Abanyamuryango n'ubutumwa biragaragara kumugaragaro.
chat.public-group-warning: Ubutumwa bwose nabanyamuryango mumatsinda rusange bareba umuntu wese. Komeza witonze.
chat.scan-member-code-notice: Erekana QR kugira ngo ugabane izina ukoresha
chat.select-or-start: Hitamo ikiganiro cyangwa utangize ikindi gishya
chat.upgrade-chat-guidance: Twakoze ku buryo ibiganiro bya Fedi biba bifite umutekano kandi bikoreshwa n'abantu batandukanye mu miryango
chat.upgrade-chat-item-subtitle-1: Vugana n'uwo ari we wese muri Fedi

community.join-community-guidance: Injira mumuryango ukunda kugirango ubone amafaranga nibindi byinshi

developer.default-groups-info: Kurema kumugaragaro, gutangaza-gusa itsinda kugirango rigizwe nkitsinda risanzwe abakoresha bifatanya mu buryo bwikora

federations.connection-status-offline: Uyu muryango ntabwo uri kumurongo. Nyamuneka wegera abarinzi b'uyu muryango cyangwa umuyobozi w'uyu muryango kugira ngo umenye amakuru.
federations.connection-status-unstable: Uyu muryango ufite ibibazo. Nyamuneka wegera abarinzi b'uyu muryango cyangwa umuyobozi w'uyu muryango kugira ngo umenye amakuru.
federations.leave-federation-confirmation: Uremeza ko ushaka gusohoka/kuva mu iri shyihamwe?
federations.leave-federation-withdraw-first: Uragomba gukura mo amafaranga yawe mbere ko uvamo
federations.leave-federation-withdraw-pending-stable: Gukura mo {{currency}} yawe biracyakorwa ho. Ongera ugerageze mu minota 10
federations.leave-federation-withdraw-stable-first: Uragomba gukura mo {{currency}} yawe yose asigaye mbere ko uvamo
federations.please-reconnect: Nyamuneka ongera uhuze kuri enterineti kugirango uhindure imiterere yabaturage.
federations.recover-from-scratch-warning: Icyitonderwa: Ibi bifata igihe kirekire. Ntugomba guhitamo ubu buryo keretse niba warahawe amabwiriza nubufasha bwa Fedi.

fedimods.debug-mode-info: Shyira mo igikoresho cya tekiniki ( Eruda) niba ushaka gufungura Fedi Mods

fedimods.leave-page-confirmation: Uremeza ko ushaka kuva kuri iyi paji/ kuri uru rupapuro? Ibyahinduwe bishobora kutabikwa
fedimods.stable-balance-enabled-info: Iha ububasha bwo guhindura SATS mu ifaranga rihamye

omni.camera-permission-denied: Genda mu iterekero uhindure ibituma kamera ikora

omni.confirm-community-invite: Ubu ni ubutumire bwabaturage, urashaka kwinjiramo?

omni.confirm-federation-invite: Ubu ni ubutumire bw'ishyirahamwe, urifuza kwinjira/kubiyunga ho?
omni.confirm-fedi-chat: Iyi ni ikiganiro cyo kuganira kuri {{username}}, urashaka kujyayo?
omni.confirm-fedi-chat-group-invite: Ubu ni ubutumire bwitsinda ryibiganiro, urashaka kwinjiramo?
omni.confirm-lightning-pay: Uku ni ugusaba kwishyura kwihuse, urifuza kukwishyura?
omni.confirm-lightning-withdraw: Uku ni ugusaba gukura mo amafaranga kwihuse, urifuza kuyakura mo?
omni.confirm-melt-cashu: Ohereza Cashu eCash kuri Wallet yawe ya Fedi (Amafaranga Lightning yakuweho)
omni.confirm-onchain-pay: Iyi ni onchain y'ubwishyu ya bitcoin, urashaka kuyishyura?
omni.confirm-website-url: Iyi ni webusite url, urifuza kuyifungurira mu ishakisha ryawe?
omni.error-network-message: Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze mugihe ufite aho uhurira
omni.error-network-title: Ikosa ry'urusobe, nyamuneka ongera ugerageze guhuza
omni.search-placeholder-username-or-ln: Injiza izina akoresha cyangwa aderesi yihuta
omni.unsupported-bolt12: Amahirwe atangwa na BOLT 12 si benshi bayashyigikiye kugeza ubu. Ihangane
omni.unsupported-chat-invite: Iyi ni code yicyumba cyo kuganiriraho. Izina ryukoresha rigomba gutumirwa mucyumba cyo kuganiriraho mbere yo kwinjira.
omni.unsupported-legacy-chat: Iki kiganiro QR iva muri version ya porogaramu itagishyigikiwe. Ihangane
omni.unsupported-no-federation: ntushobora kuyikoresha mbere y'uko winjira mu ishyirahamwe. Ahubwo gerageza kugenzura ubutumire bw'ishyirahamwe
omni.unsupported-on-chain: Aderesi za on-chain bitcoin ntizirashyigikorwa. Ihangane
omni.unsupported-unknown: Hmm, ubu si bwo buryo tuzi. Ihangane

onboarding.by-clicking-i-accept: Nukanda kuri " Ndemeye" uraba wemeye amabwiriza agenga uyu murimo kuri {{tos_url}}
onboarding.chat-earn-save-spend: Andikirana, unguka, bitsa kandi unakoreshe mu buryo bwihariye amafaranga hamwe n'abo mu muryango wawe
onboarding.greeting-instructions: Ubu rero uzabasha kohereza amafaranga; vugana n'umuryango wawe n'ibindi byinshi ukoresheje Fedi
onboarding.guidance-1: Vugana, unguka, bitsa kandi ukoreshe amafaranga mu buryo bwihariye ukoresheje umuryango wawe
onboarding.guidance-2: Fedi ikoresha umuryango wawe mu kubikora mu buryo bworoshye mu kubika no guha umutekano/kurinda amafaranga yawe, mu kuyahindura mu yo mu gihugu cyawe cyangwa se no kubona ubufasha
onboarding.guidance-3: Ukoresheje Fedi ubona by'umwihariko ayawe asigaye, kwishyurwa n'ubutumwa bundi utarinze gukoresha imbaraga
onboarding.guidance-4: Fedi ikoresha bitcoin n'imiyoboro yihuta mu kuguhuza n'amahirwe ari ho mu rwego runini kugira ngo wunguke amafaranga ukoresheje ikoranabuhanga kandi ku mabwiriza yawe
onboarding.guidance-public-federations: Gergeza mu muryango uhereye ku rutonde rwa Awesome Fedimint
onboarding.new-users-disabled-notice: Ihangane iri shyirahamwe ntabwo riri kwakira abantu bashya
onboarding.unsupported-notice: Iri shyirahamwe ntabwo rigishyigikiwe. Ntabwo abantu baryinjira mo
onboarding.username-instructions: Izina ukoresha niryo abandi banyamuryango bazajya bakumenyeraho
onboarding.welcome-instructions-new: Nk'umunyamuryango mushya w'ishyirahamwe, urakira ububiko bushya
onboarding.welcome-instructions-returning: Nk'umunyamuryango ugarutse w'ishyirahamwe, ububiko bwawe buzasubizwa ho. Ibi bishobora gufata iminota mike
onboarding.welcome-instructions-unknown: Abanyamuryango bashya bahabwa ububiko bushya. Abanyamuryango bagarutse bo bazaba bafite ububiko bwabo bwa kera busubizwa ho ubwabwo

parser.unsupported-bolt11-zero-amount: Inyemezabwishyu z'aya mafaranga atari ho ntabwo zishyigikiwe. Kora inyemezabwishyu nshya ifite ho amafaranga wongere usubire mo

permissions.allow-camera-description: Imibare y'ibanga yasuzumwe, amazina yakoreshejwe, kohereza amafaranga n'ibindi
permissions.allow-storage-description: Ohereza dosiye, shiraho ishusho yawe, nibindi byinshi
permissions.update-later-disclaimer: Ibi bishobora gusubizwa ku gihe bwa nyuma

pin.backup-notice: Niwibagirwa ibanga ryawe, icyo wabitse ni cyo nzira yonyine yo gusubirana konti yawe
pin.recover-with-backup: Kugarura konte yawe hamwe na backup yawe
pin.recovery-notice: Niba wibagiwe PIN yawe, urashobora kugarura kwinjira kuri Fedi hamwe na backup yawe hanyuma ugakora PIN nshya.

popup.ended-description: Iri shyirahamwe ry'agateganyo rifite <bold> ku ndunduro{{date}}</bold>
popup.ending-description: Iri shyirahamwe ry'agateganyo <bold> rizarangira {{date}}</bold>). amafaranga asigaye azacungwa ku bushishozi bw'abacunga

receive.balance-not-spendable-offline: Aya asigaye ntabwo azashobora gukoreshwa kugeza wongeye kugaruka ku murongo
receive.no-incoming-funds-detected: Nta mafaranga yinjira yagaragaye. Nyamuneka gerageza nyuma.
receive.onchain-expert-only: Kubwumutekano wawe: Gumana ingano yubucuruzi munsi ya 40 kB kandi NTUGUKORESHE iyi adresse mugihe kizaza. Ibi bizafasha gukumira ibibazo byose ushobora kubitsa.

recovery.camera-access-information: Mu gufasha hakoreshejwe igaruza, uzakenera kwemerera Fedi gukoresha kamera yawe igenzure ibanga ry'igaruza rusange
recovery.choose-method-instructions: Hitamo uburyo wakoresheje mu kubika mu mufuka wawe bwa mbere winjira (Umuryango)
recovery.continue-recovery-description: Gukira bizatwara igihe gito kurenza uko twari tubyiteze. Urakoze kwihangana kwawe.
recovery.create-a-new-wallet-instead: Shyira ho ububiko bushya mu mwanya wabwo
recovery.create-new-wallet-guidance: Ubu bubiko buzashobora gukoreshwa gusa kuri iki cyuma
recovery.from-different-device: Kuva ku cyuma gitandukanye ujya kuri kino
recovery.guardian-approval-instructions: Abacunga bakeneye kwemeza ko ari wowe ugaragara muri videwo ya Fedi kugira ngo bagaruze amafaranga yawe
recovery.guardian-qr-instructions: Abacunga bazakenera kugenzura uyu mubare w'ibanga QR mu gutangira gukora igaruza rusange
recovery.invalid-qr-code: Uyu mubare w'ibanga w'igaruza rusange si wo
recovery.locate-social-recovery-instructions-1: Ushobora kuba wasangije inshuti zawe iyi dosiye cyangwa warayibitse mu myanya itandukanye yindi
recovery.locate-social-recovery-instructions-3: Izina rya dosiye ya Fedi igaragara nka:
recovery.locked-device-guidance-1: Ububiko bw'iki cyuma bwajyanywe mu kindi cyuma
recovery.locked-device-guidance-3: Niba wifuza gushyira ho ububiko bushya muri iki cyuma, nyabuneka siba wongere gushyira mo Fedi üëç
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-1: Fedi ishobora gukoreshwa kuri telefoni imwe gusa mu gihe kimwe. Kugira ngo uhere konti yawe hano mu mutekano:
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-3: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Kura Fedi kuri iyi telefoni hanyuma uyishyireho bundi bushya
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-4: ‚ö†Ô∏è Banza ubike kugira ngo utabura uburyo bwo kubona amafaranga yawe!
recovery.migrated-device-success-guidance-2: Noneho, kura Fedi kuri iyi telefoni hanyuma uyishyireho bundi bushya.\n\n Ibuka gukoresha amagambo wanditse kugira ngo ugarure konti yawe.
recovery.migrated-device-success-guidance-3: Niba ukeneye ubufasha, <anchor>kanda hano</anchor> kugira ngo uhamagare ikipe yacu y'ubufasha
recovery.nothing-to-download: Nta kintu twafungura kuva mu bacunga
recovery.opening-backup-file-failed-instructions: Ukubika dosiye {{fileName}} byanze ko ifunguka. nyabuneka gerageza kandi ugaruze uturutse mu yindi waba rashyize ahantu hantu
recovery.paste-social-recovery-code: Shyira ho umubare w'ibanda wa social recovery
recovery.paste-social-recovery-code-instead: Ahubwo shyira ho umubare w'ibanga wa social recovery
recovery.personal-recovery-instructions: Injiza amagambo 12 wanditse igihe wabikaga bwa mbere mu bubiko bwawe
recovery.personal-recovery-method: Niba waranditse amagambo 12 wabashije kugaruza, ongera uyinjize kugira ngo ugaruze ububiko bwawe
recovery.recovery-assist-confirm-check-1: Umunyamuryango muri kumwe amerewe neza, aratuje; nta kimuhungabanya
recovery.recovery-assist-description: Umunyamuryango wa fedi arasaba ubufasha bwo kugaruza umufuka we
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-1: 1. Genzura niba umunyamuryango atuje kandi afite umutekano
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-3: 3. Reba videwo yabo ya Fedi yabitswe
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-4: 4. Emeza ko byari umuntu umwe muri videwo yabitswe
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-5: 5. Emeza cyangwa uhakane ugusaba kugaruza amafaranga y'abanyamuryango
recovery.recovery-assist-thank-you: Wakoze kuba wafashije umunyamuryango kugaruza amafaranga ye
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-1: Reba iyi videwo wemeze umwirondoro w'umunyamuryango
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-2: None se iyi videwo irerekana umunyamuryango umwe uri kugerageza gukora ubu igaruza rusange?
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-no: Oya, umuntu wagaragaye muri videwo si umwe mu banyamuryango
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-yes: Yego, umuntu wagaragaye muri videwo ni umwe wo mu banyamuryango
recovery.recovery-in-progress-balance: Igaruza riri gukorwa. Amafaranga asigaye araza kuba ahari vuba
recovery.recovery-in-progress-chat-payments: Igaruza riri gukorwa. ibiganiro birebana no Kwishyura biraza gutangira vuba
recovery.recovery-in-progress-payments: Igaruza riri gukorwa. Kwishyura biraza gutangira vuba
recovery.select-a-device-guidance: Hitamo icyuma cyo kwimurira mu bubiko busanzwe ho
recovery.social-recovery-instructions: Fungura dosiye ya social recovery Fedi yafunguwe igihe wafataga ukabika ya videwo. Turagusaba kuyibika no kuyigabana n'inshuti
recovery.social-recovery-method: Nufata videwo, wahura n'abarinzi kugira ngo bemeze umwirondoro wawe
recovery.social-recovery-unsuccessful-instruction: Gerageza kugaruka ku barinzi kandi ugaragaze umwirondoro wabo
recovery.successfully-opened-fedi-file: Dosiye yawe yo muri Fedi yafunguwe neza
recovery.transfer-existing-wallet-guidance-1: Iki kizazana ububiko bwawe ukoresha ubu muri iki cyuma kandi bifunge ububiko bwo ku kindi cyuma
recovery.transfer-existing-wallet-guidance-2: Ntabwo ukeneye icyuma cya kera mu gukora iyimura

stabilitypool.stable-balance-beta: Nibintu biranga beta. Nyamuneka nyamuneka wishimire hamwe na bike hanyuma utange amakosa yose muri Igenamiterere.

support.effective-support-1a: Mugukomeza, wemera ko Fedi ashobora gukusanya bimwe
support.effective-support-1b: gusa kugirango tuguhe inkunga nziza ishoboka.
support.effective-support-2a: Hitamo kutagabana? Ntakibazo! Ntushobora buri gihe gushakisha ibyacu
support.enter-ticket-number: Injiza nimero y'itike yatanzwe n'ikipe yacu.
support.how-to-launch: Niba ukeneye ubufasha, urashobora gutangiza ikiganiro cyo kugoboka ukanze buto hepfo.
support.log-disclaimer: Ntukoreshe iyi fomu keretse iyobowe ninama ya Fedi. Nyamuneka banza utubwire ibibazo byose <anchor> hano </anchor>.
support.title: Baza Fedi
support.zendesk-initialization-failed: Ntabwo twashoboye kugera kubiganiro byingoboka. Nyamuneka reba umurongo wa enterineti hanyuma ugerageze.

wallet.show-fiat-txn-amounts-info: Amafaranga yo gucuruza azerekanwa mumafaranga yatoranijwe
